Frequently Asked Questions
How do I download HyperSpace?
Go to the App Store or Google Play and tap "Install".
Does the app require internet access?
No, it works offline.
How much does the app cost?
It’s free, with an option to upgrade to a subscription.
Will my data sync across devices?
Yes, all data is synchronized with the web version.
